props.headerProps: Pass props to the default header.

slots.[`header.${string}`]: Slot for a specific header. See [`v-data-table-virtual` API](/api/v-data-table-virtual) for more information.
slots.[`column.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a column.
slots.[`item.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a row cell.
slots.header.data-table-expand: Slot for the expand button in the header.
slots.header.data-table-select: Slot for the select-all checkbox in the header.
slots.body: Slot to replace the default rendering of the `<tbody>` element.
slots.body.append: Slot to add content below the table.
slots.body.prepend: Slot to add content above the table.
slots.bottom: Slot to add content below the table.
slots.colgroup: Slot to replace the default rendering of the `<colgroup>` element.
slots.column.data-table-expand: Slot to replace the default `v-icon` used when expanding rows.
slots.column.data-table-select: Slot to replace the default `v-checkbox-btn` used when selecting rows.
slots.data-table-group: Slot for custom rendering of a group.
slots.data-table-select: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell with the select checkbox.
slots.expanded-row: Slot for custom rendering of an expanded row.
slots.group-header: Slot for custom rendering of a group header.
slots.headers: Slot to replace the default rendering of the `<thead>` element.
slots.item: Slot to replace the default rendering of a row.
slots.item.data-table-expand: Slot to replace the default `v-icon` used when expanding rows.
slots.item.data-table-select: Slot to replace the default checkbox used when selecting rows.
slots.loading: Defines content for when `loading` is true and no items are provided.
slots.top: Slot to add content above the table

events.click:row: Emits when a table row is clicked. This event provides 2 arguments: the first is the native click event, and the second is an object containing the corresponding item for that row. **NOTE:** will not emit when table rows are defined through a slot such as `item` or `body`.
events.update:expanded: Emits when the **expanded** property of the **options** prop is updated.
events.update:groupBy: Emits when the **group-by** property of the **options** property is updated.
events.update:modelValue: Emits when the component's model changes.
events.update:options: Emits when one of the **options** properties is updated.
events.update:sortBy: Emits when the **sort-by** property of the **options** prop is updated.
